trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName" /> event of a serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName" /> de um gerenciador de serialização.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> to resolve object names during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado é usado pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> para resolver os nomes de objeto durante a serialização e desserialização.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The following code example attaches a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName> event of a specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo anexa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName> um evento <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>.
